website_summaries.verdict: Uses a formula that's 99% caffeine free, which is helpful for those sensitive to caffeine.
pros: Some people prefer the gummy over a capsule or pill, making it easier to take the supplement
Includes extra B vitamins to improve the body's ability to metabolize carbs and fats
Includes 16 vitamins and minerals to maintain nutrition while dieting

customer_reviews.title: thankyou hydroxy cut i lost 6 pounds with my weight i will buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: what i liked about this product is that i trust hydroxycut and these delicious weightloss gummies had me lose 6 pounds in 4 days. i recommend this product it does work
customer_reviews.author: christa wiswesser

customer_reviews.title: only 15 day supply makes these pretty expensive
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak on whether or not these work, but after reading the directions to take 3, 2 times a day, I realize this is only a 15 day supply. That makes them expensive and not packaged in a quantity that would be a good trial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: I really love the Hydroxycut Gummies they did not make me jittery ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love the Hydroxycut Gummies they did not make me jittery they work very well I've been using them for two weeks and I have lost 5 pounds so thank you Hydroxycut
customer_reviews.author: T .Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Shocked...
customer_reviews.text: They actually worked. Not only did they work, but they helped to curve my appetite. Read some reviews about how they're disgusting. Personally thought they taste decent..one of those situations where everyone is different. Kinda like people watching the same movie and all feeling different about it. In short, try them. Dont let one person's taste buds stop you from losing weight using these things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very consistent taking them, but they seem to hold me back from pigging out!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who thrive
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! Love it ! I feel inches coming off .
customer_reviews.author: Remelyn Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting!!
customer_reviews.text: No idea if these work or not, I just got them. But I just HAD to review based on my first dose. The taste.. absolutely HIDEOUS!! I was ready to puke after the first one.. had to swallow the next 2 whole with some water. I'd much rather just have the pills.. these things are disgusting and a disgrace to gummies!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Giesler

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these supplements are delicious! However, they did not affect my weight in any way, shape, or form. I purchased them on a lightning deal, but I definitely won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: happyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do anything (at all)
customer_reviews.text: I started a new diet and exercise program. After 4 weeks of intense workouts, drinking a lot of water, and totally changing my eating habits...I didn’t loose a single pound. I followed the directions exactly. I’ve probably gained some muscle but that was never the point. I was a paratrooper in the Army and my knees have taken substantial damage and I want to relieve some of that stress. Unfortunately this didn’t do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun McHalffey

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant taste
customer_reviews.text: I love gummy vitamins as much as the next girl, but these are NOT the good gummies. They taste like the awful chewable vitamins my mother force fed me as a child. Took one dose of these, and I won't be taking any more.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Not terribly effective
customer_reviews.text: So far I've taken these about halfway through the bottle now and I'm underwhelmed with their effectiveness and I've also realized personally, I don't really care for a gummy capsule they do have a tendency to really stick to your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Reality tourist

customer_reviews.title: Sceptical
customer_reviews.text: So I religiously ate my gummies and not sure if it really works. Hate take pills and thought this would be a great alternative...maybe. I'm still going to continue to take them. By the way, there is a weird after taste, it is NOT like your yummy tasting gummies from the candy store.
customer_reviews.author: Kuching

customer_reviews.title: Heartburn
customer_reviews.text: Only took about 4 gummies as directed. Stopped because of heartburn/gastric discomfort
customer_reviews.author: Magaille

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: I have only had for a week and can tell its starting to work! I also walk everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Demetria Overmyer

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: It works in the sense that it definite curbs appetite. You have to recognize that and then work with it.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Old, Terrible version
customer_reviews.text: Beware, this is the old terrible version, not the new, updated version that actually tastes good. These are terrible. I feel like I was ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T. Haag

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work. I have not lost a single pound while taking this. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Side effects.
customer_reviews.text: These gave me dry mouth something fierce. Ended up throwing away half of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Fruitsnacks
customer_reviews.text: These basically ended up being expensive fruit snacks for me. They were tasty, but I did not see any results with them. I’m sure they work for some people, but they just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Teresi

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t eat these, tasted awful and the texture made me want to vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin courtney

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I lost 3 lbs a week using this; in total I lost almost 27 lbs. I personally enjoyed the taste of it. I mean it was an acquired taste but over time it became accustomed to it. I was working out 5-6 days a week and spending a lot of time in the sauna.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Lam

product_meta.title: Hydroxycut Gummies Non-Stimulant Weight Loss, Great Tasting Mixed Fruit, 90 Count
product_meta.description:
Lose weight your way. From the makers of America’s no.1 Selling weight loss supplement brand comes an exciting and great-tasting gummy, with mind-blowing great taste and now with b vitamins to help metabolize fats, proteins and carbs. These delicious and convenient gummies give you a great new weight loss option that makes it convenient to take on the go. You now have the option of combining Hydroxycut diet pill, Hydroxycut drink mix or Hydroxycut gummies to hit your weight loss goals. Average weight loss with key ingredient (c. canephora robusta) was 10.95 Lbs. In a 60-day study with a low-calorie diet, and 3.7 Lbs. In a separate 8-week study with a calorie-reduced diet and moderate exercise.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :5.51 x 2.99 x 2.99 inches; 13.62 Ounces
 * Date First Available :August 8, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Iovate Health Sciences Incorporated
 * ASIN :B074NC947Q

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:3.5 out of 5 stars62 ratings Lose weight your way. From the makers of America’s no.1 Selling weight loss supplement brand comes an exciting and great-tasting gummy, with mind-blowing great taste and now with b vitamins to help metabolize fats, proteins and carbs. These delicious and convenient gummies give you a great new weight loss option that makes it convenient to take on the go. You now have the option of combining Hydroxycut diet pill, Hydroxycut drink mix or Hydroxycut gummies to hit your weight loss goals. Average weight loss with key ingredient (c. canephora robusta) was 10.95 Lbs. In a 60-day study with a low-calorie diet, and 3.7 Lbs. In a separate 8-week study with a calorie-reduced diet and moderate exercise.
feature_bullets: POWERFUL WEIGHT LOSS - Fformulated with a scientifically researched key weight loss ingredient (C. canephora robusta) to help produce significant weight loss results.
STIMULANT FREE - This formula is 99% caffeine free, ideal for those who are sensitive to caffeine.
METABOLIZE MACRONUTRIENTS - The addition of B vitamins helps to metabolize carbs, proteins and fats.
ESSENTIAL VITAMIN - These super-convenient gummies contain 16 essential vitamins and minerals, including vitamin D plus a complex of B vitamins.
PERFECT FOR ON THE GO - Not only are they delicious, but the gummy format is also ideal for those who don’t like swallowing caplets.
